original_title: Latest trends in textile and leather sourcing showcased
original_body_lines: TEXPO Pakistan, the country’s largest textile exhibition, is gearing up to present an exciting showcase of the latest innovations and trends in the textile and leather industry. The highly anticipated event will be held from May 26th to 28th, 2023 at the Expo Center in Karachi, Pakistan. The 4th edition of TEXPO will focus on highlighting sustainability in the textile and leather sector of Pakistan, providing a common platform for industry specialists to meet and explore globally competitive prices and premium quality products.

TEXPO Pakistan has become a flagship event in the textile and leather industry, attracting professionals, manufacturers, and suppliers from around the world to explore the vast potential of Pakistan’s textile and leather market. The 2023 edition of TEXPO Pakistan promises to be a dynamic and vibrant showcase, featuring a diverse range of products and services, from raw materials to finished goods made in Pakistan.

Under the theme of “Weaving the way to Sustainability”, TEXPO Pakistan 2023 will highlight the latest advancements in sustainable practices, technologies, and products in the textile and leather industry of Pakistan. This reflects the growing global demand for environmentally responsible and socially conscious products, and positions Pakistan as a leading player in sustainable textile and leather production.
